short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display alternative texts for images on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps users display all alternative texts for images on a web page. The extension also reports if images have missing texts or missing alt-attributes.
